Dear Manager,

Thank you for contacting Garena.

Please be informed that our server, Malaysia and Singapore, caters the best connection from Malaysia and Singapore only. There is no servers in Hong Kong, but Hong Kong player are playing at our servers which is Malaysia and Singapore, Hong Kong ISP is the one that is providing the connection to you to our server. From our side, we only manage the servers which is not in Hong Kong and we do not manage the connection of a player to our server, your connection is fully manage by your ISP.

Unless our server crash it will affect every player, however for now players from Malaysia and Singapore is not experiencing connection issue.

We apologise for any inconvenience caused by your ISP.

Thank you for understanding.

Your Sincerely
Brandon

Dear Manager,

Thank you for contacting Garena.

Please be informed that our server, Malaysia and Singapore, caters the best connection from Malaysia and Singapore only. There is no servers in Hong Kong, but Hong Kong player are playing at our servers which is Malaysia and Singapore, Hong Kong ISP is the one that is providing the connection to you to our server. From our side, we only manage the servers which is not in Hong Kong and we do not manage the connection of a player to our server, your connection is fully manage by your ISP.

Unless our server crash it will affect every player, however for now players from Malaysia and Singapore is not experiencing connection issue.

We apologise for any inconvenience caused by your ISP.

Thank you for understanding.

Your Sincerely
Brandon

Dear Manager,

Thank you for the prompt reply,

We are please to inform you that is not that we reply very quickly is just that this has been happening for quite sometime and full investigation has been conducted and it has already determine that there is nothing more we are able to do from our side, as we've mention in the previous email that we do not handle players connection but only the game server, and our server caters for Malaysia and Singapore connection only.

Of course is sound peculiar that all ISP in Hong Kong is facing a connection issue to our server, therefore players need to clarify the problem with their ISP instead of Garena, as we've mention we do not handle the connection, only server.

Ultimately, this is still a connection issue that is related to Hong Kong ISPs, you will still need to clarify the problem with your ISP or any other ISPs in Hong Kong.

We do appreciate that so much players is loving the game, however, as much as we wish to assist you, there is nothing we are able to do from our side as the players connection is manage by their ISPs.

I seek your kind understanding in this matter.

Thank you.



Your Sincerely
Brandon
